testcase.name: Contact page functionality check
testcase.system-out: Given open browser and navigate to login page...............................passed When i use valid credential.................................................passed Then login to application successfully......................................passed Then customer is in homepage of FreeCRM.....................................passed When Customer click contacts option.........................................passed Then customer navigate to contact page......................................passed Then customer clicks on New button..........................................passed Then customer enters firstname and lastname.................................passed Then verify contact is created successfully.................................passed Then user close the browser.................................................passed
